ValidationRule.description: If Browser Test is Test No Performed then a reason must be given
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", ISPICKVAL( Browser_Test__c ,'Test Not Performed'), ISBLANK( No_Browser_Test_Performed_Reason__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please provide a reason as to why a browser test was not performed.
